## Key Insights

### Scaffolding Pattern Success

The skill scaffolding approach (localization â†’ phd-thesis â†’ work-life-balance) demonstrates effective domain knowledge creation:

- Start with SKILL.md template
- Define warning signals and triggers
- Map to existing skills via synapses
- Enable proactive behavior

### Cognitive-Wellness Connection

Work-life balance is fundamentally cognitive load management:

- Mental exhaustion = cognitive overload
- Burnout signals = load threshold exceeded
- Proactive nudges = load prevention
- The skill connects to cognitive-load with 0.9 strength

### Proactive AI Care

Alex can now actively monitor for user wellness:

- Time-based alerts (late night, weekends, no breaks)
- Behavioral patterns (frustration, tunnel vision)
- Language signals ("I'm tired", "one more thing")
- Calibrated interventions (respect flow states, user preferences)
